Heading and Description
Corporate Events
Transform your next corporate event into an engaging and team-building adventure at Elev8 Fun. Our activities are designed to foster collaboration and team spirit, making it the perfect setting for corporate outings, team-building exercises, and company celebrations that go beyond the conventional.
Buttons Section
end widget-span
end row
end row-wrapper
end widget-span
end row
end row-wrapper
Not Seeing the Perfect Fit?
Our Sales Team Can Customize Everything!
Talk To Us
Close

Book your event now
Book your event now
Close
Adrenaline Rush
(MINIMUM (10) PARTICIPANTS)
Race to the finish with your friends in a Go-Karting Pro Race, complete with event space, delicious food options, an hour of arcade-free play, and customizable drinks! Participants must be at least 14 years old and 62 inches tall. Closed-toed shoes are required; crocs and sandals are not permitted.
Package Includes
Room Rental for 2 Hours (Room Depending on Guest Count)
1 - Pro Race Per Participant
1 - Hour Arcade Time Card Per Guest
Catering Selection - Food & Drink Packages Available
Unlimited Non-Alcoholic Beverages
Dedicated Event Host
Custom Welcome Signage
Scheduled Priority Time Slots
Maximum of 30 Participants
end widget-span
end row
end row-wrapper
Book your event now
Book your event now
Close
Double Fun
(MINIMUM (10) PARTICIPANTS)
Mix and match two exciting activitiesâ€”Laser Tag, Mini Golf, or Arcade Free Play. This package includes event space, delicious food options, and a dedicated server, perfect for an unforgettable social gathering!
Package Includes
Room Rental for 2 Hours (
Room Depending on Guest Count)
1 - Activity Per Guest *Excludes Go-Karts*
1 - Hour Arcade Time Card Per Guest
Catering Selection - Food & Drink Packages Available.
Unlimited Non-Alcoholic Beverages
Dedicated Event Host
Custom Welcome Signage
Scheduled Priority Time Slots
end widget-span
end row
end row-wrapper
Book your event now
Book your event now
Close
Strike & Play
(MINIMUM (10) PARTICIPANTS)
Enjoy 2 hours of bowling and arcade fun with this package, complete with event space, delicious food options, and a dedicated server!
Package Includes
1-Activity Per Guest *Excludes Go-Karts*
1-Hour of Bowling
1-Hour Arcade Time Card Per Guest
Catering Selection -Food & Drink Packages Available.
Unlimited Non-Alcoholic Beverages
Dedicated Event Host
Custom Welcome Signage
Scheduled Priority Time Slots
Private Event Space is Available for an Additional Fee
end widget-span
end row
end row-wrapper
Book your event now
Book your event now
Close
Axe & Aim
(MINIMUM (10) PARTICIPANTS)
For a social event with a twist, this package offers 2 hours of axe-throwing, along with billiards, electronic darts, retro arcade games, and more. Includes delicious food options and a dedicated event server in a social space! Participants must be 18 years or older. Closed-toe shoes are required; crocs and sandals are not permitted.
Package Includes
Level Up Lounge Rental for 2 Hours
1-Hour of Axe Throwing for 10 Guests
Catering Selection - Food & Drink Packages Available.
Unlimited Non-Alcoholic Beverages
Dedicated Event Host
Custom Welcome Signage
Scheduled Priority Time Slots

Sidebar with anchor links for each category
Normalize selected categories
Generate Sidebar Links
Events
Main FAQ Content Area
No Results Message
No Results Found
FAQ Categories and Items
Events
How far in advance should I book my event?
We recommend booking at least 2-3 weeks in advance to secure your preferred date and time.
Does everyone in my party need to sign a waiver?
Yes, anyone participating in activities must sign a waiver.
Can I bring outside food or a birthday cake?
Outside food and drinks are not allowed, but you may bring a store-bought cake or dessert for celebrations.
How early can I arrive to set up my event space?
30 minutes prior to your event start time
What is required for booking a pre planned event?
Booking an event space, activity selections and a minimum food & beverage spend of $100 for birthday parties and $40 per person for adult social gatherings and corporate events
Can I add food on the day of my event?
Yes! However, food ordered on the day will come from the regular restaurant menu, not the catering menu. It may also take longer if there are other guest orders at the same time.
Can I bring decorations?
Yes! You are welcome to bring themed decorations. However, confetti, glitter, and silly string are not allowed.
Do you provide decorations?
We provide tablecloths, plates, napkins, cups, and utensils in red, blue, green, purple, pink, or black.
Can I hang decorations in my event space?
If you are renting a private event room, only tape may be used to attach banners to walls.
Can I reserve bowling lanes?
Bowling lanes can be pre-booked through private event packages. Otherwise, lanes are first-come, first-served.
Is there a minimum or maximum number of participants for an event?
â€¢ Minimum: 10 participants
â€¢ Maximum: No limit!
Can I book just a party room without purchasing a full party package?
No, party rooms are reserved for guests who book a full event package.
How do event itineraries work?
Each event has a pre-planned itinerary to ensure a smooth experience. Our event team schedules activities in a way that prevents overcrowding and maximizes enjoyment.
Can I make special requests for my event?
Yes, special requests are considered based on space availability, other scheduled events, and operational feasibility. Last-minute changes may not be possible, so we recommend making requests in advance.
Can I request a custom event package?
Yes! We can customize event packages based on your needs. Contact our event team to discuss options.
Do you offer VIP or premium event packages?
Yes, we have VIP packages that include private rooms, catering, and personalized experiences.
Can I extend my event beyond the scheduled time?
Extensions may be possible based on availability. Additional fees may apply.

Our diverse attractions, including 150+ arcade games, state-of-the-art bowling alleys, thrilling go-kart tracks, laser tag arenas, ropes courses, and mini-golf, ensure every visit is an adventure. Weâ€™re committed to fostering community connections through our events and dining experiences, all while championing sustainable development and environmental responsibility.Â Â Elev8 Fun is all about bringing innovative fun and heartfelt community connections together under one roof, creating a warm and vibrant space for families and friends to enjoy

MISSION STATEMENT
end widget-span
end row
end row-wrapper
end widget-span
end row
end row-wrapper
At Elev8 Fun Indoor Adventure Parks, our mission is to provide unique entertainment experiences that bring joy and excitement to our guests of all ages. We are committed to fostering an environment of respect, where every guest and employee is valued. Safety is our top priority, and we strive to create a secure environment for everyone. We aim to create memorable moments, build lasting relationships, and contribute positively to each local community
end widget-span
end row
end row-wrapper
end widget-span
end row
end row-wrapper
Arrow SVGs at top-left
Flickity Slider
end widget-span
end row
end row-wrapper
Core Values
At Elev8 Fun, our core values shape everything we do. We believe in Respect, ensuring every guest and team member feels valued and appreciated. Our Vision drives us to innovate and push boundaries in entertainment. We uphold Integrity, fostering trust through honesty and excellence. Community engagement is at our heart, and we actively support local initiatives, events, and partnerships to make a lasting impact. These values define us and fuel the unforgettable experiences we create daily.
RESPECT
We treat every guest, employee, and partner with the utmost respect. We ensure a positive and welcoming environment for everyone by fostering a culture of inclusivity and appreciation.
VISION
Our passion for excellence drives us to improve and innovate continually. We are dedicated to pushing boundaries and setting new standards in the entertainment industry.
COMMUNITY ENGAGEMENT
We are committed to building strong relationships with the local community through our local sponsorships, volunteer programs, community events, and charitable donations.
INTEGRITY
We uphold the highest standards of honesty and respect in all our operations. Our commitment to integrity ensures that we build trust with our guests, employees, and the community.
COMMUNITY SERVICE
We are dedicated to prioritizing customer satisfaction by delivering exceptional, responsive, empathetic, and friendly service.
EXCELLENCE
We strive for excellence in every aspect of our operations, ensuring high-quality experiences and continuous improvement.
SAFETY
We prioritize the safety and well-being of all guests, vendors, and employees.
end widget-span
end row
end row-wrapper
end widget-span
end row
end row-wrapper
Frequently Asked Questions
Got questions? Weâ€™ve got answers! From booking details to activity guidelines, find everything you need to know before your visit. Check out our FAQs and get ready for an unforgettable time at Elev8 Fun!
More Information
Career Opportunities
Looking for an exciting career in a fast-paced, fun-filled environment? Join the Elev8 Fun team! Weâ€™re always on the lookout for energetic, passionate individuals to bring the fun to life. Apply today and be part of something amazing!
More Information
Investor Relations
Elev8 Fun is growing, and weâ€™re just getting started! Learn more about our vision, expansion plans, and how you can be part of the future of entertainment. Letâ€™s build something incredible together!
More Information

Had my daughterâ€˜s 10th birthday and it was a great experience for all the kids! Service was great and amazing. Our host was very kind to the children. Kids had a blast with laser tag and the 3-D VR experience.

Great place! Really enjoyed going here ðŸ˜Š.  So many things to do in one place including bowling. l went  with my boyfriend  and we did the putt putt super cute pirate theme. Definitely will come back and try out the other activities.

Heading and Description
CELEBRATE BIG, PLAY HARD, MAKE MEMORIES!
Parties & Events
From birthday bashes and corporate gatherings to unforgettable adult celebrations, Elev8 Fun has the perfect space for every event. Let us handle the fun while you focus on the good times. Customizable packages, thrilling activities, and exciting attractions await.
Buttons Section
end widget-span

end row-wrapper

end row-wrapper
Transform your corporate events into unforgettable experiences! Whether youâ€™re hosting a team-building day or a holiday party, Elev8 Fun has the activities and amenities to make it extraordinary. Add a little friendly competition with go-karts, bowling, or arcade challenges to bring your team closer together.
More Information
Make their special day unforgettable with wall-to-wall excitement! Whether they love racing, gaming, or jumping into adventure, we bring the ultimate birthday experience. Our team handles the details while the kids take over the funâ€”so parents can sit back, relax, and enjoy the smiles!
More Information

end row-wrapper
end widget-span
end row
end row-wrapper
Who says the fun has to stop when you grow up? Whether youâ€™re celebrating a birthday, a bachelor/bachelorette party, or just a night out, we have all the necessary action. Go full throttle on the go-kart track, battle it out in the arcade, or roll a perfect game in bowling. The best nights start here!
More Information
Looking for a fun, easy, and unforgettable outing for your group? Whether youâ€™re organizing a summer camp field trip, coordinating with a youth group, or planning a day out with your local program, we offer high-energy attractions, tasty food options, and an exciting atmosphere. From arcade thrills to go-kart action and everything in between, Elev8 Fun is where memories are made.
More Information
